Push an element on to the end of this collection. This method is an alias of append.

item
A model to add to the colleciton
var Dog = Falcon.Model.extend(); var Dogs = Falcon.Collection.extend({model: Dog}); var dogs = new Dogs(); dogs.push({"name": "Fido"}); console.log( dogs.pluck("name") ); // => [Fido] dogs.push( new Dog({name: "Spot"}) ); console.log( dogs.pluck("name") ); // => [Fido, Spot] dogs.push([ {name: "Skip"}, {name: "Bump"} ]); console.log( dogs.pluck("name") ); // => [Fido, Spot, Skip, Bump]
